name: Haunted (itch) (Insomne)
description:
Survive one more night at work

You're the abandoned hotel's vigilante but the ghosts  who live in this hotel hate you, they're always triggering hotel's alarms so you have to get out and they try to kill you

If they get too close to you, you die...

How to play:

  • Move using the arrow keys
  • Press X to use your crucifix so ghost won't kill you
  • Watch TV to speed up time

You can download for free the source code(.p8) right HERE
